verses.text: \w At|strong="H2063"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w my|strong="H0637"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* trembleth, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w moved|strong="H2063"\w* \w out|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* its \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* wonderfully \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* doth \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* unsearchable \w things|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* commandeth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* go \w down|strong="H3588"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* winter \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w shower|strong="H1653"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0376"\w* sealeth \w up|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* covert, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w den|strong="H4585"\w*.

\w Out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w parts|strong="H2315"\w* shall \w a|strong="H0935"\w* tempest \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w cold|strong="H7135"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* north.

\w When|strong="H7341"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* bloweth there cometh \w frost|strong="H7140"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* again \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are poured \w out|strong="H4325"\w* abundantly.
Corn desireth \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*, \w and|strong="H6051"\w* \w the|strong="H0637"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w spread|strong="H6327"\w* their \w light|strong="H0216"\w*:

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* go \w round|strong="H4524"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w*, whithersoever \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* governeth \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* lead \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

\w Whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w one|strong="H0518"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* what \w place|strong="H0776"\w* soever \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* mercy \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* command \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

Hearken \w to|strong="H5975"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H6381"\w*, \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*: \w Stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* \w wondrous|strong="H6381"\w* \w works|strong="H6381"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Dost thou \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* commanded \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rains, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shew \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*?

Knowest thou \w the|strong="H5921"\w* great paths \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* knowledges?

\w Are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w hot|strong="H2525"\w*, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w south|strong="H1864"\w* wind blows upon \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

Thou perhaps hast made \w the|strong="H5973"\w* heavens \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, which \w are|strong="H5973"\w* most \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*, as if they were \w of|strong="H7834"\w* \w molten|strong="H3332"\w* brass.

Shew \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* we \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w for|strong="H3045"\w* we \w are|strong="H4100"\w* wrapped \w up|strong="H6186"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* things \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*? \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w air|strong="H7307"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* sudden \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* thickened \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* drive \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

Cold cometh \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* praise \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.

\w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* worthily: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* ineffable.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* seem \w to|strong="H0376"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* dare \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.
